metadata.title: CVE-2018-19857 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The CAF demuxer in modules/demux/caf.c in VideoLAN VLC media player 3.0.4may read memory from an uninitialized pointer when processing magic cookiesin CAF files, because a ReadKukiChunk() cast converts a return value to anunsigned int even if that value is negative. This could result in a denialof service and/or a potential infoleak.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
